POST.POST_BODY: Any information at all really? Your experience with the 1 hour /3 hour test? If diagnosed, any tips on diet/monitoring? What did you have to do? If already delivered and had gd, what was your labor experience, any complications from gd? Failed 1 hour by a lot. 3rd pregnancy, barely passed 3 hour with first 2, but have a feeling i won't pass 3 hour this time, scheduled for monday. Any tips appreciated

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY: I went to day @ 27 weeks and did the one hour partt. Now i guess i have to wait to hear from the dr. Amd if so then i have to go back for three hours. But do not eat the morning. U go they told me

My third pregnancy as well, i didn't pass the 1 hour test with all 3, but i passed the 3 hour one with all of them, this last time i didn't eat anything sweet couple days before the test and drank a lot of water! Idk if that helps but i passed!
failed the 1 hr test , didn't eat after 8 pm for the 3 hr test and passed ... drink plenty of water tho and ask for ice
